relics.name: Fire Dragon
relics.description: Avoid the damage caused by Burn .
relics.flavorText: There are no records of her having the blood of the Dragon Kind mixed in. There was only a persistent deep-rooted delusion towards the human she was deeply in love with.

relics.name: Elixir of Rejuvenation
relics.description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the start of combat, heal 10 HP.
relics.flavorText: One of the treasures inside the Treasury of the King of Heroes.It is said to be able to rejuvenate a person's physical appearance.It was originally a spiritual herb that was plucked from a ravine,It is a 'Medicine for Longevity' that was misrepresented as the Medicine for Immortality.

relics.name: Holy Shroud of Magdalene
relics.description: Whenever you would receive unblocked attack damage from an Elite,reduce it by 3 .
relics.flavorText: Noli me tangere.It is precisely in the mud of exorcism, where proof of a Saint is set.

relics.name: Divinity
relics.description: Whenever you would deal unblocked attack damage,increase it by 3 .

relics.name: Bond
relics.flavorText: Even if it's slightly different from the last time you met them, you still remember all the bonds with them.

relics.name: Necromancy
relics.description: When you receive Fatal Damage ,There is a certain probability that reduce damage to avoid death,and heal a little HP.
relics.flavorText: In the world of mages, there are many spells that should be avoided.

relics.name: The Black Grail
relics.description: NP Damage Up 80% .At the end of your turn,give 1 damage to you.
relics.flavorText: An illusion seen by a man haunted by justice.The corrupted Grail speaks.It says a price is required for what he seeks.Just like the maiden of fate, singing of love.

keywords.name: Arts
keywords.description:
As the first attack card you played,gain NP generation rate up buff this turn.
When playing 3 times in a row,gains extra NP.

keywords.name: Buster
keywords.description:
As the first attack card you played,gain damage up buff this turn.
When playing 3 Buster cards in a row,make an Extra Attack.

keywords.name: Command card
keywords.description: Has a clear color and base damage value, but the damage and hits are determined by the hidden value of the current Spirit Origin.

keywords.name: Hc
keywords.description: Reduce the cost of this card by 1 energy for each Buster in your hand.

keywords.name: Np card
keywords.description: Special attack card.When NP >= 100,add it to your hand.Cost all NP when playing.Overcharge will more powerful.

keywords.name: Quick
keywords.description:
As the first attack card you played,gain Crit Star generation rate up buff this turn.
When playing 3 times in a row,gains extra Crit Star.

keywords.name: Spirit origin
keywords.description: Kiyohime currently has two Spirit Origin: Berserker and Lancer .They have different NPCard and hidden value.

keywords.name: Summon
keywords.description: Summoning a servant to help you in combat.If this servant exists,reset their skills,and increase the maximum HP.

keywords.name: ★
keywords.description: The more crit stars,the higher the crit probability. Crit determined.

keywords.name: ☆
keywords.description: The more crit stars,the higher the crit probability.
